column1: #Text=Five batches of 1g of polycrystalline Sr3PbO, A–E, were\rsynthesized from PbO and 3–5% excess amount of Sr metal\rfrom the stoichiometry in a sealed tantalum ampoule, as\rreported previously [25].
#Text=All the syntheses and the measurements\rwere conducted without exposing the samples to air\rbecause the samples are extremely air sensitive.
